verbose_text: Cre induced recombination in homozygous floxed Nr3c1 (GR fl/fl) mice completely abolishes GR expression, while GR expression is only partially reduced in GR fl/wt mice [XREF_BIBR], allowing for a better comparison with a siRNA mediated GR knockdown.
